ExtendedSimpleSQLFeatureStore.SQLStatement: select st_asbinary(st_transform(geometry, ?)) geometry, site_designation from inspire.protected_site ps join inspire.jt_site_designation jtsd on jtsd.fk_protected_site = id join inspire.dt_site_designation dtsd on dtsd.id = jtsd.fk_site_designation where geometry && st_setsrid(st_geomfromtext(?, -1), 28992) and site_designation = 'WAVGebieden' order by dtsd.id desc
ExtendedSimpleSQLFeatureStore.LODStatement: select st_asbinary(st_transform(geometry, ?)) geometry, 'WAVGebieden' site_designation from inspire.protected_site_wav_gebieden where geometry && st_setsrid(st_geomfromtext(?, -1), 28992)
